title: PUMA Men's Roma Sneaker
description: From the PUMA archives in 1968, this lightweight training shoe was equipped with comfort enhancing features such as a thick padded tongue and orthopedic arch supports. This version features an all over leather upper and fresh spring colorways. PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.
